an4.53:4.1: At one time the Buddha was travelling along the road between Madhura and Verañja,
an4.53:4.2: as were many householders, both women and men.
an4.53:4.3: The Buddha left the road and sat at the root of a tree,
an4.53:4.5: They went up to the Buddha,
an4.53:4.6: bowed, and sat down to one side.
an4.53:5.1: “Householders, there are four ways of living together.
an4.53:5.3: ~A male zombie living with a female zombie; ~a male zombie living with a goddess; ~a god living with a female zombie; ~a god living with a goddess.
an4.53:6.1: And how does a male zombie live with a female zombie?
an4.53:6.2: It’s when the husband kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcohol and drugs which cause negligence. He’s unethical, of bad character, living at home with heart full of the stain of stinginess, abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins.
an4.53:6.3: And the wife is also … unethical, of bad character …
an4.53:6.4: That’s how a male zombie lives with a female zombie.
an4.53:7.1: And how does a male zombie live with a goddess?
an4.53:7.2: It’s when the husband … is unethical, of bad character …
an4.53:7.3: But the wife doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs which cause negligence. She’s ethical, of good character, living at home with heart rid of the stain of stinginess, not abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins.
an4.53:7.4: That’s how a male zombie lives with a goddess.
an4.53:8.1: And how does a god live with a female zombie?
an4.53:8.2: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …
an4.53:8.3: But the wife … is unethical, of bad character …
an4.53:8.4: That’s how a god lives with a female zombie.
an4.53:9.1: And how does a god live with a goddess?
an4.53:9.2: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …
an4.53:9.3: And the wife is also … ethical, of good character …
an4.53:9.4: That’s how a god lives with a goddess.
an4.53:9.5: These are the four ways of living together.”
an4.53:11.6: with a zombie for a husband.
an4.53:12.6: with a god for a husband.
an4.53:13.1: When both are faithful and kind,
an4.53:13.4: say nice things to each other.
an4.53:14.1: They get all the things they need,
an4.53:14.4: when both are equal in ethics.
an4.53:15.2: both equal in precepts and observances,
an4.53:15.3: those who desire sensual pleasure rejoice,
